title: Terrifying moment daredevil leaps off gondola tower in the Bulgarian mountains
text:
A solo adventurer who is travelling the world jumping off tall objects filmed himself leaping from a gondola tower before crash landing.

The daredevil, from Germany, leapt from the structure in Bulgaria.

With panoramic views behind him, the base jumper, who calls himself BaseWeekly, talks to the camera on the way up the tower used to support cable cars.

With panoramic views behind him, the base jumper, who calls himself BaseWeekly, filmed himself leaping from a gondola tower before crash landing in Bulgaria

He says: 'Pretty awesome jump, I'm stoked for this one. Scared as usual. Sketchy ladder on the way up. But really looking forward to sending this.

'I've waited for all the cars in the car park to leave. Sunset is about to go on. And there's nothing left to do now but boogie on and have a bit of fun.'

He then makes his way down a narrow set of stairs looking out towards the breathtaking mountain scene ahead of him.

He says: 'Three, two, one, see ya,' before leaping off the structure.

The daredevil, from Germany, says: 'Three, two, one, see ya,' before leaping off the structure

He pulls a cord behind him sending his parachute billowing.

But, as he comes in to land, he loses his footing and skids along the gravel-covered floor.

While smiling, he exclaims: 'That was sketchy! Thanks for watching. Hopefully I'll land better next time.'

As he comes in to land, he loses his footing and skids along the gravel-covered floor. While smiling, he exclaims: 'That was sketchy! Thanks for watching. Hopefully I'll land better next time'

Alongside the video, he wrote: 'I've been trying to do this jump for a while but the weather hasn't been good the last couple of times.

'This is a gondola tower half way up a mountain, the climb was a bit scary because there was no cage but I think I'm getting used to these ladders as it wasn't as bad as I thought it was going to be.

'Such an epic view from the top! I slipped on the gravel on the landing but just a couple of scrapes so can't complain.

He pulls a cord behind him sending his parachute billowing. Stunning views of the Bulgarian mountains can be seen as he glides towards the ground

'The footage was filmed on the Go Pro Fusion 360. BASE Weekly is a channel where I travel the world jumping from objects using my parachute to land safely (most of the time).'

The daredevil said: 'I chose this jump because I love jumping in the mountains but also like jumping off man-made objects and on this one I got to do both.

'Also I’ve never seen a video of a gondola tower jump before so thought it would be cool.'
description: The solo adventurer is travelling the world jumping off various tall structures. The base jumper, who calls himself BaseWeekly, said he is 'stoked for this' jump in Bulgaria.
